## Air Quality

@fig-airquality further explores the impact of temperature on ozone level.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(airquality, aes(Temp, Ozone)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Temperature and ozone level.](pdf_example_files/figure-html/fig-airquality-1.png){#fig-airquality width=672}
:::
:::
